meanings.definition: The state or quality of being female.
meanings.sent1: Her femaleness was evident in her nurturing nature.
meanings.sent2: The femaleness of the queen bee is crucial for the hive's survival.
meanings.sent3: The femaleness of the flower made the garden bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, her femaleness was as fierce as a lioness protecting her cubs.
meanings.sent5: The femaleness of the star actress shone brightly on stage.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being a woman or girl.
meanings.sent1: The femaleness of the protagonist in the story inspired young girls everywhere.
meanings.sent2: In many cultures, femaleness is associated with grace and strength.
meanings.sent3: Her femaleness was so evident, she could charm even the grumpiest of men.
meanings.sent4: The femaleness of the river symbolized life and fertility in the ancient myths.
meanings.sent5: The femaleness of the moon was reflected in the calmness of the night.
